name: Analyze Bacterial Growth Rate
description: Analyze bacterial growth data and extract growth parameters from OD600 measurements
author: Biomni Synthetic Biology Tools

inputs.name: time_points
inputs.description: Time points at which OD600 measurements were taken (in hours)

inputs.name: od_measurements
inputs.description: Optical density (OD600) measurements corresponding to each time point

inputs.name: strain_name
inputs.description: Name of the bacterial strain being analyzed

inputs.name: output_dir
inputs.description: Directory where to save the output files

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: Research log summarizing the analysis steps, fitted parameters, and results
